channel.title: Perspective through the lense of Lotta Moberg, PhD, CFA
channel.description: My research and analysis synthesizes global economics, politics, and policy as a macroeconomic analyst at the Dynamic Allocations Strategies team at William Blair.

item.title: Featured on Economic Rockstar
item.description: A conversation about the logic, past and potential future of special economic zones.

item.title: Featured on Economic Rockstar
item.description: A conversation about NEOM, the city that Saudi Arabia is building from scratch, and what our knowledge on special economic zones says about its potential.
